snippet: Scholar, consultant, expert witness — Jeffrey A. Eisenach has worn all these hats while playing a leading role in the debate over telecommunications policy in the United States. Here is a look at the potential conflicts that this situation creat...
lead_paragraph: Scholar, consultant, expert witness — Jeffrey A. Eisenach has worn all these hats while playing a leading role in the debate over telecommunications policy in the United States. Here is a look at the potential conflicts that this situation creates for Mr. Eiensach, a scholar at the American Enterprise Institute.

headline.main: Jeffrey Eisenach: Tech Industry Consultant and Think Tank Scholar
